step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting with fists clenched and arms drawn in. Keep those muscles tight as you inhale.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms horizontally while exhaling and relaxing. This looks good.
Well done on repeating the movement with good form. Remember to keep the outward motion smooth.
Your execution of opening fingers and extending arms is consistent. Keep up the good work with the exhale and relax.
Fantastic! You're consistently performing the horizontal pumping motion with good muscle engagement and relaxation. Keep up the great effort.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists tight and muscles engaged as you inhale, then open your fingers and relax as you exhale. This helps with lymph drainage.
